issue.title: [Rust] Support pretty printing timestamp, date, and time types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11318](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11318). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

I found this while removing `test::format_batches` (PR to come shortly),

pretty printing was printing numbers rather than dates.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11318?focusedCommentId=17268533) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9263
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9263>
